If you play using Ultimate Magic, then you have to have this product.

108296.name: Ultimate Spell Decks: Ultimate Combat Spell Cards
108296.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Wish you didn't have to flip through books or searching PDFs every time you want to cast a spell? You can't see to remember the range, duration or Save of a spell off the top of your head? Wish you could introduce unique and new spells to your campaigns in an easy format. Help is coming for you in the form of Ultimate Spell Decks: Ultimate Combat Spell Cards. For use with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game players and GMs! Ultimate Spell Decks: Ultimate Combat Spell Cards are printable forms for players and GMs alike which makes managing a spellbook simple and easy. Now your storehouse of magical power will fit right in the palm of your hand with these easy to use, convenient spell decks. Each card contains the significant and relevant rules and description of a different spellcaster's arsenal for use with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. If you play using the Ultimate Combat sourcebook, then you have to have this product.

108297.name: Ultimate Traps Deck
108297.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Need some deadly traps with awesome visuals in a hurry? Then look no more. Ultimate Traps Decks provides 10 ready to go deadly traps that are Pathfinder compatible for use anywhere in your game. Each card includes a description and the mechanics of a trap, as well as a vivid, high quality image of the trap to show your players exactly what killed them. Bring the fear of Total Party Kill back into your game with Ultimate Traps Deck

108298.name: Ultimate Feat Decks: Ultimate Combat
108298.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Wish you didn't have to flip through books or searching PDFs every time you want to know what your feat did? You can't see to remember the modifier, duration or bonus you get off the top of your head? Help is coming for you in the form of Ultimate Feat Decks: Core Rulebook. For use with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game players and GMs! Ultimate Ultimate Feat Decks: Ultimate Combat are printable cards for players and GMs alike which makes managing and knowing all you unique and interesting feats simple and easy. Now your storehouse of feats will fit right in the palm of your hand with these easy to use, convenient feat decks. Each card contains the significant and relevant rules and description of a different feat for use with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. If you play Pathfinder, then you have to have this product.

108299.name: Ultimate Chase Decks: Forest & Jungle Chases
108299.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Need a way to create an awesome chase sequence in a hurry? Then look no further than the Ultimate Chase Decks. Ultimate Chase Decks: Forest & Jungle Chases. It does matter about how fast you are running, it's about the environment you are running through. Ultimate Chase Decks: Forest & Jungle Chases contains 34 chase cards full-color cards gives you a new way to run chases and races in your Pathfinder Roleplaying Game sessions. Each card presents a complex obstacle difficult enough to challenge heroes when they are chasing down evil. Ultimate Chase Decks: Forest & Jungle Chases gives you twice as many wildness based chase cards than any other company for half the price. Bring the fear and danger of chases back into your game with Ultimate Chase Deck

108300.name: The Sands of Egypt
108300.description:
from the back of the box

The Sands of Egypt is an action adventure starring you in the role of Lord Charles Buckingham III, the world-famous British explorer. Attacked by nomads while on an archaeology expedition to Egypt, Lord Charles was knocked unconscious and is now hopelessly lost in the fabled land of the Pharaohs. As the drama unfolds, we find him wandering the wilderness alone. He carries nothing but a compass, his courage, and his wits.

As the star, you’ll encounter the blistering heat of the barren sands and experience the ecstasy of a desert oasis. Take a rest under the shade of a date palm and enjoy the elixir of life: Water. Continuing the search, you’ll risk all to find the secret treasure chamber concealed within the lost pyramid.

The Sands of Egypt is a split-screen, animated adventure game uniting Hi-res computer graphics with a text display of hints and riddles. Unlike other adventures, The Sands of Egypt describes the wonders of the desert and also paints a detailed picture of each move. The game commands a vocabulary of over 100 words. Finding the right words is part of the fun!

The Sands of Egypt is a true test of endurance and self-reliance. With dash and daring you’ll overcome puzzling hieroglyphics, stubborn camels, and mystical mummies. Do you have the stuff of which legends are made?

108301.name: Dictator
108301.description:
User Summary

Dictator is an old ZX Spectrum game where you take the role of Dictator from the Ritimban Republic.
The game consist on a series of cabinet choice making options while you rule Ritimban. These include pleasing any of the different citizen groups, increasing you chance by buying an escape helicopter or "budget detouring" to a Swiss acount.

108302.name: Phantom Crash
108302.description:
From the back of the box:
Make yourself disappear for a moment.
Make your enemy disappear forever.

"In the wake of massive air pollution and economic disaster in Tokyo, Japan has relocated its capital. Old Tokyo has become the battleground for a new breed of public entertainment called Rumbling. Observing from a massive airborne viewing station, spectators watch Scoobees battle to the death. More than just high-speed, heavily armed Mechs, Scoobees have an unprecedented stealth capability - turning invisible at will for brief periods of time. The stakes are high. The enemies are ruthless. The action is intense. Are you ready to rumble?"

108303.name: Saracen
108303.description:
from the back of the box

During the Holy Crusades, the brave, adventurous young soldiers of the Christian world travelled to the Holy Land to fight the Medieval Infidel Saracens.

As Ilan The Crusader, you must make your way through mazes of stone walls that are patrolled by fanatical guards. Your goal: destroy the Chief of the Saracens.

Your only weapon is a longbow, but when your arrows shoot straight and true, they have the power to crash through walls or start a chain reaction of explosions.

Mazes are bobby-trapped with bombs; blue-steel balls thunder heavily after you; and locked doors present a challenge to your wit and ingenuity.

FEATURES:
-Action-packed strategy game
-100 pulse-quickening game levels
-Player-controlled level selection
-Choice of joystick or keyboard action

108304.name: Shooting Arcade
108304.description:
from the back of the box

Step right up and try your luck! Win a cuddly dancing bear for the little lady. It’s Shooting Arcade...the most colorful, captivating amusement park attraction on the four corners of the earth.

Put down your popcorn and listen to the pop-pop-popping of the bullets as you shoot your way to success.

It’s easy! Just pull the trigger and hold the gun steady while you try for stampeding elephants, waddling ducks and jumping bunnies. READY, AIM FIRE! But be careful... ‘cause when the bullets run out, so do you.

Shoot a smile and win big. Fire at a frown and your bullets will turn to blanks. Any way you play it, you’ll get a bang out of Shooting Arcade.

108305.name: Thunderbirds (1989)
108305.description:
User Summary

Thunderbirds 2 is based on the TV show and places you in control of 2 members of the team in each of the 4 different rescue missions.
Each mission is played as game of its own, there you control 2 of the members of the team as they find the needed "tools" and solve the various puzzles to help them finish the mission. The missions are timed and when a mission is accomplished a password is give to play the next.
These are:

Mine rescue- Alan and Brains are traped trying to stop a mine from flooding and rescuing the trapped miners.

Sub crash- Alan and Gordon are sent to help prevent the destruction of a nuclear sub which is scuttled at the bottom of the sea.

Bank job- Lady Penelope and Parker must break in the Bank of England to recover a video tape of the previous missions before.

Countdown to terror- Virgil and Scott must infiltrate into Hoods secret base before he uses the plans he stole of the Thunderbirds ships.

108306.name: Tumble Bugs
108306.description:
from the back of the box

The hot sands of the Egyptian desert are spotted with great stone pyramids. These monuments pay homage to great Kings like Tut, Ramsses and Amenhotep. Their rich treasures and mumified remains are guarded by unsolvable mazes, secret passages and mysterious curses.

One lesser known pyramid stands apart from the rest. It is the tomb of King Tutanskoop. Tutanskoop had been King for three weeks when he was caught erasing 18 minutes of hieroglyphics from the court records. As a punishment he was cursed to spend eternity wondering his tomb, picking up Tanna leaves while being chased by vicious Tumble Bugs. His only reward for his labor is another maze, more leaves and more Tumble Bugs!

Tumble Bugs is a fast, Hi-Resolution arcade game. It is challenging, addicting and fun!

108308.name: Stalingrad
108308.description:
User Summary

Stalingrad is a ZX Spectrum game that recreates the famous WW2 battle.
Its a strategy game that lets you lead the german army in their campaign on the East front in 1942.

108309.name: VEX: Cross The Red Line
108309.description: An expansion for Vex with 50 new cards containing new challanges

108310.description:
This is a stand-alone game, not an expansion.

Flashing Steel is a skirmish miniatures game (one figure = one combatant) in the Song of Blades and Heroes family. The flavour is smack in the middle of The Three Musketeers and pirate action of all kinds. Swing from those chandeliers or ratlines. Kick the chair or skewer the roast chicken.

Flashing Steel was written to address a couple of key changes needed from Song of Blades and Heroes for this genre. One was to reflect the slower rate of fire for matchlock weapons. That was easy enough.

The second was to bring in the flair and 'swashbuckling' aspects of the period into the rules. It is often forgotten that schools of martial arts were as thorough and widespread in Europe as they were in Japan in the 1500's through the 1600's. There were all kinds of flashy moves and clever tricks.

So the rules weave in this kind of option to do more than simply move-attack-resolve-repeat. More than just strict combat options, the Swashbuckling rules allow you to be more interactive with your terrain. It opens up more of the game to narrative, or story-telling wargaming. All of which is part of the great Songs engine, of course. With Flashing Steel we have tried to extend and strengthen that side of the system. -Andrew Boswell, designer
108310.name: Flashing Steel

108311.name: The Battle Brothers
108311.description:
From the publisher:

Two men in jail for armed robbery and assault make a dangerous escape from a prison work crew. On the run and chained together, the two stumble upon a pair of strange-looking bracers and lock them onto their wrists. Instantly they're joined together psychically, but they also gain tremendous physical power. Linked together as the Battle Brothers, they work together seamlessly and hire themselves out as high-priced muscle. How will your heroes handle this terrible two-some? This product is for Mutants & Masterminds Third Edition.

108312.name: Al Unser Jr.'s Road to the Top
108312.description:
Al Unser Jr.'s Road to the Top is a Super NES racing video game where the player has to progress from go-karts to snowmobiles, IROC racing cars, and eventually to Indy racing cars.

If the player does well, then his/her final challenge is to take on Al Unser, Jr. in the final event at Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. This race uses the Molson Indy Vancouver as a final test of the player's hard-earned skills. Of course, the player can also practice every stage of the game except the final stage. Go-kart racing involves regional action in the United States of America while snowmobiles provide challenge for the game's simulated winter months. Competing in the stock cars of the IROC is considered to be gaining experience for the faster and lighter open wheel vehicles of the Indy league.

Source: Wikipedia, "Al Unser Jr.'s Road to the Top", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108313.name: Sports Illustrated: Championship Football & Baseball
108313.description:
Sports Illustrated: Championship Football & Baseball (known in Europe as All-American Championship Football) is a sports video game that is licensed by the leading sports magazine, Sports Illustrated, which features both American football and baseball games.

Source: Wikipedia, "All-American Championship Football", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108314.name: The Backyardigans: Viking Voyage
108314.description:
The Backyardigans have the whole wide world in their yard to explore! Join them on a Viking adventure, as they brave steamy jungles, stormy seas, and sandy deserts in search of a land that no one has ever discovered before!

PLAY MODES

Adventure Play
In this play mode, join Vikings Pablo, Tyrone and Uniqua as they sail off to discover a new land.

Quick Play
In this mode, you can choose any of the 4 adventure locations individually.

Source: The Publisher Website.

108315.name: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
108315.description:
An American Tail: Fievel Goes West is about a cartoon mouse who must make his way to the Wild West based on the movie of the same name released back in 1991.

The player must either fight or avoid cats and other obstacles as he strolls westward. The game is side-scrolling with a side-view of the action at nearly all times. The character is armed with a pop gun that can eliminate the bad guys using a non-violent approach to the Wild West genre. An NES version of this game was planned. However, it was never released.

Source: Wikipedia, "An American Tail: Fievel Goes West (video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108317.name: The Wiggles: It's Wiggle Time
108317.description:
Help the Wiggles find their friends and their instruments to perform a big music show tonight. Kids will make the show a success by completing the 4 Learning Adventure Games using numbers, letters, object identification, and basic math! The games range from helping Greg collect letters to get the instruments, to helping Murray order numbers and find Henry the Octopus on the beach. The Learning Adventure games also enhance spatial skills and hand-eye coordination. Four shorter Learning Zone games focus on memory, sequences, colors and music to keep kids on target with preschool skills. This Smartridge also has a bonus Music Room where the Wiggles put on a big stage show.

Age Group: 3-5 years

Source: The Publisher Website.

108318.name: Barbie: Vacation Adventure
108318.description:
The game is played using a side-scroller platformer.

In Wyoming, Barbie spends her time going on a camping trip. In her California home, she spends her days lounging in her apartment building. In Iowa, she goes to the local county carnival to help find an escaped pig. In Florida, she goes to the beach and plays volleyball and scuba diving. In Texas, Barbie plays with horseshoes.

This game is a part of the Sega Club collection; it is designed for younger female gamers in mind. On most of her trips, she travels with her best friend Midge, who the second player controls in two-player games.

Source: Wikipedia, "Barbie: Vacation Adventure", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108319.name: Barkley: Shut Up and Jam!
108319.description:
Barkley Shut Up and Jam! is a 1994 basketball video game for the Super NES, Atari Jaguar, and Sega Mega Drive that stars former NBA all-star Charles Barkley as he jams and slams in the downtown basketball courts of different NBA cities. The gameplay is similar to NBA Jam.

Source: Wikipedia, "Barkley Shut Up and Jam!", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108320.name: Barney: The Land of Make Believe
108320.description:
One day, Barney, BJ and Baby Bop find a book about a wonderful place called The Land of Make Believe, where a beautiful Princess lives in a castle. Barney and his friends decide they would like to meet the Princess and become her friends, so they begin a journey to find her. First, there is preparation to be done, and then exciting travel in a hot air balloon! Along the way, they will meet many different animals in the forest, find exciting games in the castle, and have a lot of fun learning new things and meeting the beautiful Princess.

Source: The Publisher Website.

108321.name: Barkley: Shut Up and Jam! 2
108321.description:
The game is played from a horizontal perspective as the player and its teammate (computer or human) try to outscore the competition using any means necessary.

Players can choose from ten "streetwise" players, not including Sir Charles himself, as they play in either an exhibition game or tournament. Since this is basketball on the street, players compete in eight different urban environments featuring graffiti, rubble, and even a moving train. Over 2,000 player animations have been included to show moves such as behind-the-back passes, double-clutches, alley-oops, and 25 different dunks. Battery backup allows players to save tournament progress, as well as individual records such as triple doubles, total wins, and total losses. In addition, digitized voice samples of Charles Barkley offer either words of encouragement or ridicule while they play.

Source: Wikipedia, "Barkley Shut Up and Jam! 2", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108322.name: Go, Diego, Go!: Save the Animal Families!
108322.description:
A rainstorm has separated some baby animals from their homes. Diego must go into the rainforest, save the animals and bring them home to their families. Are you ready to race to the rescue? ¡Al rescate, amigos!

Source: The Publisher Website.

108323.name: Sengoku: Way of the Warrior
108323.description:
“Wash blood with blood” – ancient Japanese proverb
Rise to power in Feudal Japan with your Samurai family in the epic Grand Strategy Sengoku
In this deep character driven strategy game, you play as the head of an illustrious Samurai family.

Description
The year is 1467 and civil war has broken out. The authority of the Ashikaga Shoguns has collapsed and it is every man for himself in the provinces. Honor and duty vie with survival in the delicate dance of power, conquest and betrayal as you attempt to unite the land of the Rising Sun through a combination of deal-making with foreign powers, sending your powerful samurai armies into battle against your enemies, and unleashing shadowy Ninja clans under the cover of darkness to assassinate your rivals!

Features
Control a noble family in Feudal Japan
Rise in influence and power within your clan and go on to claim the ultimate prize
Conquer and grow while rewarding your most valued retainers in your bid to become Shogun
Detailed historical map of Japan during the warring states period
Make deals with external powers, including the Portuguese and the Dutch
Employ the aid of powerful Ninja clans when your Samurai armies are not enough

Source: The Developer Website.

108324.name: Fiche de Personnage Avancee
108324.description:
Introduction
Une Fiche de Personnage extrêmement complète, comportant six pages. Elle permet, pour ceux qui le souhaitent, de détailler à fond leur personnage : Identité & Compétences, Équipement & Possessions, Techniques & Traits, Relations & Contacts, Origines & Vécu, Carrières & Évolution.

Google Translation
A very complete character sheet, with six pages. It allows for those who wish to detail their character thoroughly: Identity & Skills, Equipment & Possessions, Traits & Techniques, Relations & Contacts, Origins & lived Careers & Evolution.

108327.description:
Massive combat walkers tread the streets, armored troops storm the buildings of Southern England, and Dust Tactics pushes deeper into urban warfare with the campaign expansion Operation "Cerberus", which features:


New rules for multilevel combat. Squads can move up and down floors of the structures they enter, gaining advantages as they fire against foes outside the walls. This campaign expansion comes with parts for a customizable three-dimensional building, allowing players to construct terrain up to three stories tall.
New skills for NCO Command Squads and heavy walkers.
Two new heroes: The Axis assassin, Angela, and the Chef, who fights with two flamethrowers.
A chronology of the alternate-reality World War II and profiles some of the war's greatest heroes.
Seven new scenarios.
108327.name: Dust Tactics: Operation "Cerberus"

108329.name: Guide du Puppet Master
108329.description:
Introduction
Le Puppet Master est un jeu de stratégie sur plateau opposant généralement deux participants, dont les origines semblent être extrêmement anciennes et pour le moins difficiles à retracer. Il est ainsi probablement issu du mélange de plusieurs jeux. stratégie différents crées par chacune des sept espèces intelligentes de Miwéa et Koméa. La fusion progressive de ces nombreux jeux aux règles parfois très différentes a vraisemblablement peu à peu abouti à la création d’un nouveau concept se devant de convenir à la psychologie spécifique de chacune des espèces.

Voici le Guide Complet de ce jeu d'anthologie accompagné de plusieurs terrains qui vont vous permettre de mettre en place de véritables parties de Puppet Master, l'un des jeux de stratégie de référence à travers les galaxies jumelles.
Deux trios de puissants batroïdes se livrent une bataille sans mercy sur différents terrains pour obtenir la suprématie.

Google Translation
The Puppet Master is a game of strategy usually between two participants. Its origins seem to be extremely old and at the very least difficult to trace. It is thus likely derived from the mixture of several games. Different strategies have been created by each of the seven intelligent species of Miwéa and Koméa. The gradual fusion of the many games and rules has sometimes made the rules very different. It has probably gradually led to the creation of a new concept to suit the specific psychology of each species.

Here is the complete guide for this game anthology with several fields that will allow you to set up real parts of Puppet Master, one of the reference strategy games through the twin galaxies.
Two trios of powerful batroïdes engage a battle without mercy on different fields for supremacy.

108332.name: Soap Opera Challenge: The Young and the Restless
boardgamepublisher: The United States Playing Card Company
108332.description: Trivia game featuring questions relating to The Young and the Restless TV series. Each card has 6 categories. A die is rolled and that indicates the question subject to be answered,

108333.name: TG Source
108333.description:
Introduction
TG Source propose un résumé synthétique du système de jeu en une dizaine de pages. La ressource indispensable et rapide à consulter pour les DM de Twin Galaxies.

Google Translation
TG Source provides a summary of synthetic gaming system a dozen pages. This is a quick and indispensable resource to consult for a DM of Twin Galaxies.

108334.name: Fiche du Système d'Annonce Tactique
108334.description:
Introduction
Une fiche récapitulative permettant de se servir très facilement du Système d'Annonce Tactique (SAT) utilisé au corps à corps : bientôt les feintes, les contres, les attaques directes et les parades n'auront plus aucun secret pour vous.
Une fiche récapitulative recto-verso qui peut servir de référent tout au long de la partie.

Google Translation
A summary sheet to be used very easily Announcement System Tactical (SAT) used in close combat: soon the feints, counter, direct attacks and parades will have no secrets for you.
A fact sheet on both sides that can serve as reference throughout the game.

108335.name: Collection de Prétirés (3 sur 3)
108335.description:
Introduction
Une collection de personnages prétirés créés en utilisant les archétypes et les Dons & Faiblesses avec 18 Points de Personnalisation.

Google Translation
A collection of characters preprints created using the archetypes as well as with Strengths and Weaknesses with 18 points of customization.

108336.name: Guide du Puppet Master: Terrains
108336.description:
Introduction
This is a PDF with some sample terrain for use with the Puppet Master game in Twin Galaxies.

108337.name: La Spirale d'Or: Guide Complet
108337.description:
Introduction
La Spirale d’Or est l’un des jeux de stratégie les plus répandus sinon le plus répandu au sein des galaxies jumelles et chose rare pour ce type de jeu, les règles usuelles sont quasiment identiques d’un bout à l’autre de Miwéa et de Koméa. Ceci s’explique principalement par la très grande ancienneté de ce loisir très populaire qui séduit tout autant les joueurs aguerris que les nouveaux venus grâce à ses principes simples et universels.

Google Translation
The Golden Spiral is the most popular strategy game across the whole of the twin galaxies. In the twin galaxies, the usual rules are virtually identical from one end to another, from Miwéa to Koméa. This is mainly due to the great antiquity of this popular recreational game that appeals equally to seasoned players and newcomers with its simple and universal principles.

108338.name: Wintersport
108338.description:
Goal: Be the first to race to position '100' (alpine cabin with a warm welcome)

Typical 'Snakes and Ladders' game from the 30's in Germany

Roll the die by turns and step forward - until you will be transported
nice & cute, individually designed pawns

Cover/design according spirit of the time (in Germany)

108339.name: La Spirale d'Or: Fiche Recapitulative
108339.description:
Introduction
This is a summarized information sheet on carrying out a game of La Spirale d'Or.

108340.name: La Spirale d'Or: Strengal vs. Jinx
108340.description:
Introduction
This is an example of gameplay of La Spirale d'Or. It is a play-by-play description of the game.

108341.description:
In a mysterious world of swords and sorcery, you are the chief (or the nurse) of a temple hospital. Around the world, heroes entered dangerous dungeons in search of fame and fortune. Your job is to nurse and make better all of these heroes from injuries, sickness, and curses of underworld. But watch out! Rival hospitals are waiting for the chance to get in your way. Will you manage to earn the world's respect as a master doctor? Or will you end up as an infamous "dynamite nurse"?

In Dynamite Nurse, a card game with deck-building mechanisms, players represent hospitals that are trying to cure wounded heroes. Each hospital has only so many beds, however, and having too many patients will result in players not being able to take care of them. Thus, players try to dump annoying patients onto each other in order to stay famous as a good hospital chief – and not as the "dynamite nurse"...

Dynamite Nurse is based on two card games from the 1980s — Dynamite Nurse and Dynamite Nurse 2: Bloody Temple — from the same designer, which explains why the original Japanese title of this design was ダイナマイトナース・リターンズ (Dynamite Nurse Returns).
108341.name: Dynamite Nurse

108342.name: Legends of Yore
108342.description:
User Summary

Legends of Yore is a typical dungeon crawler in which the player has the choice between three different classes: warrior, ranger and wizard.

While the starting town offers various shops and some quests the player can choose between different dungeons and locations where he hunts down enemies and earns experience and increases his stats in search for treasure.

108343.description:
Print & play wargame on the most important battle of the period for Central Europe, forging the domain of Hapsburgs over Bohemia for several centuries to come.
It is part of the Battles of the Middle Ages series, a simple to medium complexity system, with variable activation based on chit pulling, variable unit strength (with a system similar to SPI's Victory in the West series), low unit density and high mortality.
Special rules for commander, charges, missile units, make the game a good introduction to wargaming, without being too difficult or too dumb
108343.name: Battles of the Middle Ages: Marchfeld
boardgamefamily: TCS Battles of the Middle Ages System

108344.description:
In Might & Magic Heroes: The Board Game, each player becomes a leader of one of four different factions hoping to conquer and govern the realms of Ashan.

At first, players control just one hero, a small army, and a city — but with every passing round, their heroes gain experience and grow in power, armies become more numerous, and small towns turn into enormous capitals. Players recruit new characters, take control of mines that produce resources and gold for their factions, defeat monsters prowling the game board, and search for magical artifacts. As time passes, they inevitably approach the final confrontation of great, magical kingdoms. The winner must prove that his faction is the best developed, boasting many heroes, multiple armies and a large capital. Whoever manages to acquire the most power becomes the new heir and the supreme ruler of the realm of Ashan — and by achieving this wins the game!
108344.name: Might & Magic Heroes
boardgamepodcastepisode: Wooden Cubes & Iron Soldiers: “Viking and Mouse Attack…” Episode 13

108345.name: L'Appel de Cthulhu - 30ème Anniversaire
108345.description:
From the publisher:

LE jeu de rôle d’épouvante dans l’univers d’Howard Phillips Lovecraft.

L’Appel de Cthulhu vous plonge dans les écrits et l’univers de l’écrivain américain H. P. Lovecraft. Entrez dans la peau d’intrépides investigateurs parcourant les années vingt, ou d’autres époques, confrontés à des secrets antédiluviens et à des créatures que l’esprit peut à peine appréhender. Découvrez des lieux que l’être humain n’aurait jamais du contempler, et encore moins fouler… La compréhension de la véritable nature de l’univers vous emmènera aux frontières de la folie et, le plus souvent, au-delà…

Vous tenez entre vos mains la toute première version couleur du livre de base, publié spécialement pour célébrer les trente années d’existence du jeu de rôles L’Appel de Cthulhu. Près d’une cinquantaine de talents, auteurs, illustrateurs, etc. ont prêté leur savoir faire pour vous emmener dans ce vaste univers. Vous y découvrirez également une toute nouvelle campagne spécialement écrite pour l’occasion, un grimoire complet des sortilèges du mythe, une rétrospective de cent dix ouvrages publiés pour L’Appel de Cthulhu et bien plus encore.
Cette édition s’appuie toujours sur le fameux basic system. Elle est totalement compatible avec les suppléments publiés depuis trente ans. Des centaines de scénarios sont également disponibles dans nos parutions et sur la toile. Les règles essentielles du jeu sont résumées en un court chapitre, pour vous permettre de jouer rapidement et le plus facilement possible. Préparez-vous à des centaines d’heures d‘aventures.

L’édition spéciale 30e anniversaire est un nouveau livre de base de 400 pages entièrement couleur qui abrite plus de 100 pages de matériel inédit :

Des articles de fonds sur le mythe et le cercle Lovecraftien
Une rétrospective des publications de L’Appel de Cthulhu à travers 110 ouvrages référencés
Carte blanche donnée à de nombreux illustrateurs (dont Caza, Fructus, Goomi, Greencat, Sullivan, Dutrait, Simonetti et bien d’autres) et partenariat avec Fantasy Flight Games
L’Atlas du Mythe en 8 pages
Une campagne française inédite « Les Trois Tourments de Tadjourah
De nouveaux textes ésotériques authentiques
Un grimoire complet des sortilèges parus à ce jour
Les règles de la 6e édition française corrigées (prise en compte des erratas)




Translation:

Call of Cthulhu plunges you into the world and the writings of American writer H.P. Lovecraft. Step into the shoes of intrepid investigators living in the twenties, or other times, faced with antediluvian secrets and creatures that the mind can barely comprehend. Discover places that humans should never have contemplated, let alone set foot... Understanding the true nature of the universe will take you to the borders of madness and, often, beyond...

You hold in your hands the first colour version of the basic book, published especially to celebrate thirty years of the Call of Cthulhu role-playing game Nearly fifty talents - authors, illustrators, etc. lent their expertise to take you into this vast universe. You will also discover a whole new campaign specifically written for the occasion, a complete grimoire of Mythos spells, a retrospective of one hundred and ten books published for Call of Cthulhu and much more.

This edition draws on the famous basic (roleplaying) system. It is fully compatible with supplements published in the past thirty years. Hundreds of scenarios are available in our publications and on the web. The basic rules of the game are summarized in one short chapter, so you can play quickly and easily as possible. Prepare yourself for hundreds of hours of adventure.

The 30th Anniversary special edition is a new book with 400 full colour pages and home to over 100 pages of unpublished material:


Feature articles on the Mythos and the Lovecraft Circle.
A retrospective on Call of Cthulhu publications - over 110 books listed.
Carte blanche given to many illustrators (including Caza, Fructus, Goomi, GreenCat, Sullivan, Dutrait, Simonetti and others) and partnership with Fantasy Flight Games.
An eight page "Atlas of Myth".
A French countryside novel The Three Tadjourah Torment.
New authentic esoteric texts.
A grimoire with all Mythos spells published to date.
The corrected rules of the sixth French edition. (Errata incorporated.)

108346.name: Cloud of Darkness
108346.description:
From the frontpage of the module:

A dark cloud hangs motionless above an ancient sacred site buried deep in the Bright Lands. An ancient power is awakingin the Bright Lands but its true purpose remains occluded. The concluding part of "Sins of Ages Past". A Living Greyhawk core adventure set in the Empire of Bright Lands for characters levels 8 - 15 (APLs 10 - 16).

A Two-Round D&D Living Greyhawk Core Adventure

108347.name: Zombie Pinata
108347.description:
Zombie Piñata is an action packed game for the iPhone and iPod touch, fight your way through over 30 stages of pure madness while fighting the now evil piñatas, find their lair deep in the Mayan archeological site and face the biggest zombie piñata of them all: Piñaton!

Source: The Game Website.

108348.name: Fields of Battle
108348.description:
Fields of Battle is a simple tabletop wargaming ruleset published in Warlock Magazine issue #12. The game is designed to introduce Fighting Fantasy gamebooks readers to tabletop gaming.

The rules are derived from the Fighting Fantasy rules: each unit has a STRIKE and a STRENGTH rating (which work like FF's SKILL and STAMINA), and a MOVE and ATTACK score. Move is the distance the unit can move in inches, Attack the number of attacks per turn (most units have only one).

Each game turn, units move or fire, then combat between units in contact is resolved (each unit adds a 2d6 roll to its STRIKE rating, the unit with the lowest result loses 2 points of STRENGTH). After combat resolution, units that have suffered losses must pass a morale test or rout. A routing unit must test morale again in the next turn and is removed from the game if it fails that second test.

The rules also include a few special rules for flank attacks, cover, fortifications and siege engines.

The rules come with a scenario (The Battle of Grey Rock) for which colour counters are included in the magazine.

108349.name: The Shrouded Shores of Abanfyl
108349.description:
From the frontpage of the module:
His capital city retaken, Duke Labahlah extends his healing embrace over more of westeren Tenh, but peril awaits at every border. The young ruler needs staunch friends friends to fight old enemies and win new allies. Turn your face toward the chill winds blowing from the Griff Mountains and pierce the mysteries of the lost lake. Part 2 of the "Legacy of Life" series. A two-round Core adventure set in and around the Duchy of Tenh for characters level 6 - 15 (APLs 8 - 16). Note: Additional TU expenditures are possible.

108350.name: Runner's Black Book
108350.description:
Publisher's blurb:


You’ve got the talent. You hopefully have lived long enough to collect a decent amount of nuyen. So show it off! Get a better gun. A bigger boat. A zeppelin that can sneak you across borders where no one thinks to look. All these toys are here, and many, many more. Runner’s Black Book is a shopping catalog for the ambitious and successful runner—and it’s a guide to the weapons, drones, and vehicles that the various forces of the Sixth World may send against you as you sneak through the shadows.


Runner’s Black Book collects material from Shadowrun’s successful PDF line of products, compiling Deadly Waves, Gun Heaven, MilSpecTech, This Old Drone, and Unfriendly Skies in their entirety, along with updated art and information. On top of that, the book includes new pieces of gear developed specifically for this volume, including the punishing Kriss X Submachine Gun and small, smooth TPP light pistol. Each piece of gear is accompanied by a full-color illustration providing a look at the item’s complete details and features.

108351.name: Dominion over Bright Sands
108351.description:
From the frontpage of the module:
For two years, the paladin Karistyne has sought to stymie the Archmage Rary's seemingly insatiable lust for power. Now, at the threshold of a darkness beyond even the reason of light, the fate of the Bright Lands must be decided. You must make the choice. A two-round Core adventure set in the Empire of the Bright Lands for characters level 6 - 15 (APLs 6 - 16). The concluding part of "Blight on Bright Sands".

108352.name: Kingdom Conquest
108352.description:
Magna, land of monsters...

This is a place where colossal towers dominate the sky line and the land is inhabited by all types of monsters imaginable.

The sole and absolute ruler "El Dor" suddenly disappears from his throne, leaving the land in unprecedented chaos.

Players will battle against each other in the quest to succeed the former ruler.

Move between online dungeon crawling and MMO Real Time Strategy, fighting against and at times, cooperating with other players across the world in order to expand your territory. The alliance that controls the most number of towers in one season will win the battle.

Source: The Developer Website.

108353.name: Night Raider
108353.description:
User Summary

Night Raider places you in command of an Avenger, a torpedo bomber
plane from Grumman.
Stationed on board the carrier Ark Royal in a section of north Atlantic your mission is to sunk the Bismark with a torpedo strike. You also have to make sure the Ark Royal isnt attacked as even if you sink your target you will lose if you dont have a carrier to return.

108354.name: Something of Value
108354.description:
From the frontpage of the module:
All adventureres dream of finding that one thing that will make them wealthy beyond their wildest dreams. Unfortunately, you seem to have found it. Now what are you going to do? A one-round Core adventure set in the Fre City of Greyhawk for characters level 10 - 15 (APLs 10 - 16).

108355.name: Market Mayhem
108355.description:
Market Mayhem is a simple Fighting Fantasy-inspired boardgame published in Warlock Magazine issue #3: http://rpggeek.com/rpgissue/49833/warlock-issue-3-volume-1-n...

The game takes place in the marketplace of Port Blacksand (the city of thieves in the Fighting Fantasy universe). One of the players is chosen to be the gamemaster, each of the other players is given a character with a secret objective. The gamemaster controls non-playing characters and is the only one to know each character's goal. Each character has three stats (SKILL, STAMINA and MOVE), some of them have extra rules, like a spell they can cast or a magic item they can use.

Each turn, players move their character on the board, then characters adjacent to each other can interact, often by fighting but other interactions are possible (like exchanging objects, talking...). Combat is resolved using standard Fighting Fantasy rules.

The goal of the game is to be the last character standing, having fulfilled his/her objective.

108356.name: Zombie Highway
108356.description:
Cars. Guns. Zombies. What more could you want!?

The goal is to survive... but you wont. The test then becomes how long can you last? It's you, your heavily armed passenger, and a boatload of super-strong, leaping zombies.

TILT. Steer to avoid obstacles all while trying to SMASH latched on zombies into debris

TAP. Shoot zombies with a growing arsenal of handguns, shotguns, and automatics. Shoot recently smashed zombies for extra damage!

REPEAT. Improve your skills, unlock weapons, beat all your friends on facebook! It will be hard to put this one down.

Source: The Developer Website.

108357.name: Michel Futbol Master / Michel Super Skills
108357.description:
User Summary

This is one of 2 games dedicated to the spanish soccer player Michel (José Miguel González Martín del Campo).
Futbol Master is the simulation of the Euro 88 in Germany.
You can chose any of the 8 finalist teams and lead them to the Euro final.

Michel Super Skill is another game dedicated to the spanish soccer player Michel (José Miguel González Martín del Campo). This game consist on a series of soccer skill tests that range from ball control to passing and shooting.

108358.name: Asphalt 6: Adrenaline
108358.description:
Get your adrenaline pumping for the newest edition of the Asphalt series. Discover 42 cars & bikes from Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin, Ducati and other world-class manufacturers. Build a collection in your 3D garage that you can explore using the gyroscope, then tune your vehicle & customize it with decals before tearing up the streets of L.A., Tokyo, the Bahamas & other beautiful locations, each rendered in HD and taking full advantage of the Retina display. You’ll be driving against tough opponents in 11 different leagues with 55 events plus Online/Local Multiplayer for up to 6 players.

Source: The Developer Website.

108360.name: Charudes
108360.description:
Risqué version of Charades. The fun is in the subject matter and probably best played by teenagers a and older.
As the box says, can you handle;
Free Willy (Movie)
Sexual Healing (Song)
Naked Gun (Movie)
and they get a lot more suggestive than that!
"Rude You Win, Prude You Lose"

108361.name: Inkluz (Numer 9 - Stycznia 2000)
108361.description:
Zawartość:

Wstępniak
Przepraszam Pana, czy zmierzamy w dobrym kierunku? -
Paweł Montwiłł

Literatura
Kącik tolkienowski

Fantasy
Warhammer Fantasy Role Play

Wstępniak - Mateusz Wiśniewski & Marek Staude

Understatement
Frequency

108362.name: Vulcan
videogamehonor: 1987/1988 Golden Joystick Best Strategy Game of the Year Winner
108362.description:
User Summary

Vulcan is a simulation of the Tunisian campaign in 1942.
You can command either the Allies or the Axis forces as you battle your way through 5 scenarios from Kesserine pass, to the Operation Vulcan itself (the final assault on Tunis and Bizerta) or the full campaign starting in 1942 when the first allied forces start to appear in the area.

108364.name: Carré 2000
108364.description:
The pieces are scattered at the start of all the squares except the finish squares. In corners only movement to adjacent squares is allowed. In central zones pieces may jump over each other with the exception of the four central squares that allow travel diagonally.

Player who moves all his game-pieces to his finish-corner is the winner.

Carré 2000 is available in two versions: the small version with nine pieces per player, and the larger version with twenty-five pieces per player.

108366.name: No Safe Port: WW2 Naval Warfare
108366.description:
"No Safe Port" is a board game covering Operational and Tactical-level naval combat during the Second World War.

"No Safe Port" is designed to cover many of the major navies that fought during WW2 and includes submarines, carriers, aircraft, battleships, battlecruisers, heavy cruisers, light cruisers, destroyers, coastal batteries, land units, and more. User printable data/record sheets show the combat details of each individual class of ship, sub, and aircraft, each with a side view graphic. Solitaire and multiplayer rules are included.

This is a significant revision of the original 'NW:WW2' game series, and adds additional details and rules to the system (including floatation loss and individualized weapon data). The Rules are modular, allowing for Basic, Advanced, and Optional/Expanded rules systems that you can choose to use or not as you wish.

This game is professionally printed with mounted couters and full color heavy cardstock maps. The 'data cards' from the previous game series has been discarded in favor of user-printable data sheets on a CD-ROM included with the game; each sheet contains combat logs for up to 7 ships/subs or squadrons of aircraft.

Features include:


Countries included: United States, Great Britain, Germany, France, Japan, Italy, Soviet Union, Australia, Denmark, and Netherlands.



Detailed yet streamlined combat mechanics including basic, advanced, optional, and solitaire rules.



Data CD-ROM with fully printable data/record sheets covering 230 ship classes (including merchants, raiders, and transports), 100+ aircraft models, 35 submarine classes, 16 types of land units.



Each printable Data/Record Sheet contains the combat statistics for the unit, condensed combat tables to help during combat, a side view of the unit, with logs for ammunition/damage records for 7 ships/subs or aircraft squadrons pre-printed on each sheet.



58 page printed Rules Manual with 24 scenarios, including historical and hypothetical scenarios.



9 Color maps 11" x 17", a color combat matrix, and 280 die-cut 1/2" color counters.



Search Matrix, 2 Play Sequence charts and 5 color reference charts.



Includes 4 six-sided dice (only standard 6-sided die are used for play).



Semi-historical Campaigns covering the Pacific, North Atlantic, Mediterranean, and Arctic theatres.



Tactical and Operational battles covering surface combat, seaplane carriers, convoys, submarines, aircraft, amphibious operations, bombardments, etc...



Combat examples are included as well as condensed combat tables on each unit data/record sheet.



The game is inteded to be played either as as a board game or with miniatures.

108367.description:
The game covers the Polish-German war campaign of the first days of the World War II. Players can take command of the German Army trying to defeat Poland as fast as possible, or play as Polish generals struggling to stop the German Army.
One turn is one day of war.

Every turn is divided into 3 phases:
- logistics
- movement
- fighting

Box contents:
- Rulebook including 3 scenarios
- 2 Boards (map of Poland and tactical board)
- ca. 200 cards (weather cards, fighting cards)
- lots of counters

108368.name: Steel and Resolve: WW1 Naval Warfare
108368.description:
"Steel and Resolve" is part of our Naval Warfare series of next generation comprehensive naval wargames covering entire time periods of naval combat. Easy to learn yet fun to play and detailed for the scale represented thus giving quality combat results. "Steel and Resolve" is designed to cover many of the major navies that fought during WW1 and includes submarines, seaplane carriers, aircraft, dreadnoughts, pre-dreadnoughts, battlecruisers, armored cruisers, light cruisers, destroyers, coastal batteries, land units, and much more! User printable data/record sheets show the combat details of each individual class of ship, sub, and aircraft, each with a side view graphic. Solitaire and multiplayer rules are included.

This is a significant revision of the original "NW:Naval Warfare" series, and adds additional details and rules to the system (including floatation loss and individualized weapon data). The Rules are modular, allowing for Basic, Advanced, and Optional/Expanded rules systems.

This game is professionally printed with mounted couters and full color heavy cardstock maps. The 'data cards' from the previous game series has been discarded in favor of user-printable data sheets on a CD-ROM included with the game; each sheet contains combat logs for up to 7 ships/subs or squadrons of aircraft.

Features include:


Countries included: Britain, Germany, France, Russia, Italy, and Austria-Hungary.



Detailed yet streamlined combat mechanics including basic, advanced, optional, and solitaire rules.



Data CD-ROM with fully printable data/record sheets covering 200 ship classes (including merchants, raiders, and transports), 36 aircraft/airship types, 30 submarine classes, 12 types of land units.



Each printable Data/Record Sheet contains the combat statistics for the unit, condensed combat tables to help during combat, a side view of the unit, with logs for ammunition/damage records for 7 ships/subs or aircraft squadrons pre-printed on each sheet.



60 page printed Rules Manual with 20 scenarios, including the full Battle of Jutland.



6 Color maps 11" x 17", a color combat matrix, and 280 die-cut 1/2" color counters.



Search Matrix, 2 Play Sequence charts and 5 color reference charts.



Includes 4 six-sided dice (only standard 6-sided die are used for play).



Semi-historical Campaigns covering the North, Baltic, and Mediterranean Seas.



Tactical and Operational battles covering surface combat, seaplane carriers, convoys, submarines, aircraft, amphibious operations, bombardments, etc...



Combat examples are included as well as condensed combat tables on each unit data/record sheet.



The game is intended to be played either as as a board game or with miniatures.

108369.name: L'encyclopédie
108369.description:
From the publisher:
Ils sont nés sur les champs de bataille de 14-18, dans le souffle des gaz et des armes à rayons X. Ils ont pris le contrôle des grandes capitales européennes. Les feuilletonistes ont fait d’eux des icônes. Les scientifiques sont fascinés par leurs pouvoir

La Brigade chimérique - l’encyclopédie et le jeu de rôle - se propose de vous transporter dans l’univers des années 20 et 30 de la célèbre bande dessinée afin de vous en dévoiler tous les mystères, de vous en présenter tous les protagonistes, de vous en faire visiter tous les lieux. La superscience et l’Hypermonde n’auront désormais plus de secrets pour vous !
Grâce à des règles de jeu exhaustives, il vous sera également possible d’y vivre vos propres aventures, dans la peau d’un surhomme devant choisir son camp au sein d’une époque troublée.

Translation:
They were born on the battlefields of 14-18, in the breath gas and X-ray weapons. They took control of the major European capitals. Soap operas have made ​​them icons. Scientists are fascinated by their power.

The chimeric Brigade - the encyclopedia and RPG - aims to transport you to the world of 20 years and 30 of the famous comic strip in order to reveal all the mysteries, you present all the protagonists of you to visit all places. The Superscience Hypermonde and will no longer hold any secrets for you! Through extensive playing, you will also be possible to live your own adventures in the skin of a superman to choose sides in a troubled time.

108370.name: L'écran de jeu
108370.description:
From the publisher:
Avec ce premier supplément officiel, le jeu de rôle de La Brigade chimérique s’enracine plus profondément encore dans la pléthorique littérature merveilleuse-scientifique européenne de la première moitié du XXe siècle. Peuplez vos aventures de dix-sept no

Les héros :
L’Ange de Fer, le colosse champion de catch
Le Docteur Pons, le pionnier dans le rapetissement des humains
Le Duo Dynamique, les gentilshommes dévoués
Fatala, la femme fatale
Gabriel, l’homme mécanique
George Leicester – Fascinax, le protecteur d’Edimbourg
Hareton Ironcastle, l’audacieux aventurier
Miss Téria, la lame cachée du Diogene Club
Sâr Dubnotal, l’héritier des pouvoirs hindous

Les super-vilains :
Hugues Mézarek – Belzebuth, le scaphandrier glacial
Herbert Millowan, le maître des araignées
L’Ichtaner, l’homme squale
Tigris, qui revêt toutes les apparences
Zigomar, l’usurpateur de pouvoirs

Les Chefs d’États
Archigos, le Grec
Jack-o’-Lantern, l’Irlandais
Ukko, le Finlandais

L’écran de jeu et son livret, en 3 volets couleur, est le premier supplément du jeu de rôle de la Brigade chimérique, publié par Sans-Détour et adapté de la bande dessinée parue aux éditions L’Atalante. Disponible en boutiques spécialisées et en librairies.

Translation:
With this first official supplement, the role-playing game La Brigade chimérique roots deeper into the plethora of wonderful-European scientific literature of the first half of the twentieth century. Populate your adventures of seventeen No.

Heroes:
L'Ange de Fer, the giant wrestling champion
Dr. Pons, the pioneer in the shortening of human
The Dynamic Duo, the gentlemen dedicated
Fatala, the femme fatale
Gabriel, the mechanical man
George Leicester - Fascinax, the protector of Edinburgh
Ironcastle Hareton, the bold adventurer
Miss Teri, the hidden blade of the Diogenes Club
Sar Dubnotal, the heir of the powers Hindu

Villains:
Hugues Mézarek - Beelzebub, the diver glacial
Millowan Herbert, the Master of spiders
The Ichtaner, shark man
Tigris, which has all the appearances
Zigomar, the usurper of power

Heads of State
Archigos, Greek
Jack-o'-Lantern, the Irish
Ukko, the Finns

The game screen and his book, in three color components, is the first supplement to the role play of the chimeric Brigade, published by Sans Detour and adapted from comic books published by L'Atalante. Available in specialty shops and bookstores.

108371.name: Aux Confins du Merveilleux-scientifique
108371.description:
From the publisher:
Aux Confins du Merveilleux-scientifique est un recueil d’aides de jeu, de nouvelles et de scénarios indépendants qui vous transporte dans les années 1930 superscientifiques ! Ces textes hauts en couleur respectent la délicate formule du radiumpunk : s’y mêlent ainsi l’Histoire, la littérature feuilletonesque, la culture populaire, les surhommes, la politique internationale, la science-fiction d’antan, etc. Tous ces ingrédients, et bien plus encore, font de la Brigade chimérique un univers original et passionnant.

Découvrez les Confins du Merveilleux-scientifique :

La Chasse au Radium, une mini-campagne qui emmène les personnages au plus profond de l’Océan atlantique dans une chasse au trésor effrénée !
Cinq scénarios couvrant toutes les années 1930 : L’Héritage de la Reine du Radium, Les Griffes de Paris, La Croix du Sud, La Frontière rouge et Les Derniers Dévots.
De nouvelles factions et organisations historiques : La Cagoule, Le X-Club, ou issues de la littérature populaire : La Ligue Fantômas, La Maison aux Rideaux rouges.
Par-delà des Chemins Oubliés : un tour d’horizon des pays de l’époque aujourd’hui disparus, de L’île des Amazones à La Vallée Perdue de Xanadu.
De nombreux articles du magazine Superscience & Vie, dévoilant les secrets de la superscience de cette période.
Trois nouvelles de Maurice Renard, l’un des plus grands auteurs de romans scientifiques – et l’inventeur du terme « merveilleux-scientifique » : Le Brouillard du 26 octobre, M. d’Outremort gentilhomme physicien et l’Homme au corps subtil.




Et bien d’autres choses encore…
Aux Confins du Merveilleux-scientifique est le second supplément officiel pour la Brigade chimérique – l’Encyclopédie et le Jeu, adapté de la bande dessinée parue aux éditions L’Atalante.

Translation:
The confines of the wonderful science-is a collection of game aids, new and independent scenarios that transports you to the 1930 superscientifiques! These colorful texts respect the delicate formula radiumpunk: mingle and history, literature feuilletonesque, popular culture, the supermen, international politics, science fiction of yesteryear, and so on. All these ingredients, and much more, make the world a chimeric Brigade original and exciting.

Discover the confines of the Wonder-scientific

The Hunting of the Radium, a mini-campaign that takes the characters in the depths of the Atlantic in a frantic treasure hunt!
Five scenarios covering the 1930s: The Legacy of the Queen of Radium, The Lady of Paris, Southern Cross, The Red and The Last Frontier devotees.
New factions and historical organizations: The Hood, The X-Club, or from popular literature: The League Fantômas, The House of the red curtain.
Beyond the Forgotten Paths: an overview of countries of the time since disappeared from the island of the Amazons in The Lost Valley of Xanadu.
Numerous magazine articles Superscience & Vie, revealing the secrets of Superscience this period.
Three new Maurice Renard, one of the greatest writers of science fiction - and the inventor of "scientific-marvelous" The Fog of October 26, Mr. Outremort gentleman of the physicist and rights in the subtle body.




And many other things ...
The confines of the wonderful science-is the second official supplement for the chimeric Brigade - the Encyclopedia and the Game, adapted from the comic book published by L'Atalante.

108372.name: La guerre des Vampyres
108372.description:
From the introduction:
Ce scénario pour la Brigade chimérique - l’Encyclopédie et le Jeu présuppose que les personnages sont affiliés à l’Institut du Radium. L’aventure se déroulant aux lentours de 1935, la jadis glorieuse institution n’a plus guère d’influence depuis que le Nyctalope a pris la suite de Marie Curie en tant que protecteur de Paris ; c’est pourquoi elle compte sur les quelques alliés qui lui restent plus que jamais.

Translation:
This scenario for la Brigade chimérique - l’Encyclopédie presupposes that the characters are members of the Radium Institute. The adventure takes place in Lentour of 1935, the once glorious institution no longer has much influence since the nyctalopic has taken over from Marie Curie as a protector of Paris, so it relies on few allies which remain more than ever.

108374.name: De Main Morte
108374.description:
From the introduction:
io pour la Brigade chimérique – l’Encyclopédie et le Jeu (qu’il convient de posséder pour le faire jouer) est prévu pour une partie relativement courte, idéale pour initier de nouveaux joueurs ou établir un premier contact avec cet univers. Il peut être joué en une simple poignée d’heures, à l’aide des personnages pré-tirés que vous trouverez en annexe ou dans le Livre de Base, ou tout autre surhomme personnalisé.

Le scénario met les personnages aux prises avec un tueur extravagant et extraordinaire, qui dérobe les mains de ses victimes. L’histoire est divisée en trois grandes par ties, conduisant les héros à la poursuite de ce meurtrier parisien. Différents encadrés sont à la disposition du parisien. Différents encadrés sont à la disposition du intrigues secondaires, s’il souhaite rallonger l’histoire.

Translation:
This scenario for la Brigade chimérique – l’Encyclopédie et le Jeu (which should have for the play) is scheduled for a relatively short, ideal for introducing new players and make initial contact with this universe. It can be played in a mere handful of hours, using pre-drawn characters that you find attached and in the Book of Base, or any other personal superman.

The script puts the characters struggle with a killer extravagant and extraordinary, who steals his victims' hands. The story is divided into three parts by leading the heroes in pursuit of the murderer in Paris. Different boxes are available to Paris. Different boxes are available to the subplots, if he wishes to extend the story.

108375.name: Winx Club: Secret Diary 2009
108375.description:
From the Back of the Box

Keep yourself up to date, stay in contact with your friends thru voice chat and wi-fi text messages. Take appointments, archive news, read the horoscope, take personality tests and discover something new about your favorite Winx, enjoy the minigames and keep everything safe with a secret password!

108377.description:
Finally, the international space industry is beginning to grow! To encourage the development, global funds are awarding prizes to companies that are outstanding in different areas. You control one of those companies and want to compete for the biggest, best and most beautiful space station the world has ever seen. But the competition is hard...

In Space Station you start your space station with a core module card on the table, then over six years (rounds) you expand it by paying and placing new module cards. Each year you start with a five card hand, crew tokens and new MegaCredits (money), with the amount of crew and money determined by the structure of your space station. You use money primarily to pay for new modules, and the crew gives you special effects on many of your modules.

During the year, the players take turns doing actions such as building, using module actions, playing event cards, repairing or passing. When everyone passes, the year ends and victory points are awarded: There are six kinds (colors) of modules and for each kind, the player(s) with the most modules of that kind is awarded a victory point. Players' crew tokens are then reset, and player may discard a card beore refilling their hand and getting money for the next year.

At the end of the sixth year, the player with most victory point wins.
108377.name: Space Station

108379.name: MotoHeroz
108379.description:
User Summary

MotoHeroz offers a clever combination of side scrolling platform racing and puzzle game. Race against a ghost or AI to find the fastest path to the finish. A solid physics model rewards insightful play. Stick the landing after big airs or loop the loops to find alternate routes. Grab powerups for immediate maneuver bonuses and collect coins and "Ancestor" markers for higher scores and vehicle modifications.

Lots of replayability - especially for completionists.

108380.name: Under Pashuvanam's Lush
108380.description:
Publisher's blurb:
Beidha.

The name invokes wonderment. It fuels the imagination of storytellers. It fills merchants with a lust for riches.

Covering most of this land is a thick jungle called the Pashuvanam, or Jungle of Beasts. The jungle deserves its name. Fierce monsters and animals plague Beidhanids and Nipuans alike, sometimes destroying entire villages. Over the last few centuries, most of the dangerous creatures have been driven away from major settlements and main roads, giving the inhabitants a sense of security. Still, stories of unspeakable horrors lurking in the jungle’s depth persist—and are regularly proven true.

Under Pashuvanam’s Lush is your introduction to this land. Here you will find adventure, rumor and mysteries. More than a sourcebook, this is an adventure which takes the heroes from the civilization of this land and through the dark foreboding jungles to ruins long forgotten.

What evil lurks under the lush?

108381.name: B.C.
108381.description:
B.C. is a strategic tile laying game using elements of abstract strategy and deck building games to tell the story of four rival tribes battling it out for control of vital resources on the Pre-Historic earth of Leakey, Von-Daniken, and "Eegah!"

Each player takes control of one of four tribes: The Aliens, Great Apes, Homo Sapiens, or Neanderthals, and attempts to gain control of the largest part of the prehistoric landscape, as represented by a grid marked by variable terrain features. Each tribe begins with a small selection of Tiles, and then must spend further actions to place those Tiles and earn "Enlightenment Points", which can be spent on new tiles and new options for the game.

The game is over when there are no further plays left on the board. Victory goes to the Tribe whose player has taken control of the most sections of the board. In the case of a tie, victory is determined by the number of Enlightenment Points still controlled by the Tribes at the end of play.

108383.name: Stone Age Kings
108383.description:
Stone Age Kings is a free browser strategy game that plays in a fanciful stone age. You begin as a small chieftain in your village and try over time to create an empire. You're playing with and against thousands of other Stone Age Kings players.

The game runs entirely in your browser and only requires the Flash plug-in from Adobe, which you will most likely already have, it's the same as the one need to watch videos on Youtube. Stone Age Kings runs even when you close the game and are no longer on the Internet. The bustle in your village goes on cheerfully, even if you do not intervene directly.

Source: The Game Website.

108384.name: Knight Rider: K.I.T.T. Challenge Card Game
108384.description:
A knight rider themed card game in which players try to build a road and then drive K.I.T.T. to safety. The game begins with each player playing a "Start" card, and placing their K.I.T.T. token upon it. Then, each player draws a card. The player with the highest number card wins all of the other cards, and then may do one of four things:
1. Build a section of their road by playing a card horizontally.
2. Move K.I.T.T. one space (if not hindered by a Hazard)
3. Play a Hazard card on another player's road
4. Play a Turbo Boost card to bypass a Hazard

The first player to build the correct length of road (7 units for 2p, 6 units for 3p and 5 units for 4p), play an "END MISSION" card, and drive K.I.T.T to the "END MISSION" card wins.

108385.name: Twenty-nine
108385.description:
Twenty-nine is a simple adding game played with traditional playing cards.

Are cards are dealt equally to all players, setting aside any remainder. Each player lays a card in turn, adding its face value to a communal total. (Aces and royals count as '1'.) The total cannot exceed twenty-nine; a player who has no legal play must pass. The player who brings the total to twenty-nine gets a point, and the total is reset to zero for the next player. When every player passes, the game is over. The player or partnership with the most points wins.

108386.name: Madballs in Babo: Invasion
108386.description:
Madballs in Babo: Invasion is a shooter from a top-down perspective. Players roll their Babo, a heavily-armed sphere, around in an arena, attempting to kill enemy players. There are ten unique Babos spread across two teams: the B*D*I and the Scorched. Each Babo has unique stats and abilities to utilize. For instance, the character Robo has high defenses, lacks speed, and can disarm enemies with his special ability.

Most of the characters, weapons, and abilities in the game are locked. A campaign mode spanning ten levels must be played to unlock characters and weapons, but downloadable content is available for purchase for players who do not wish to play the campaign.Weapons are unique in the fact that they have two modes of firing. Most weapons may switch between ballistic and laser firing modes, with other weapons switching between heat and cold. Players may gain an advantage over opponents by switching to a weapon the enemy is weak to.

Source: Wikipedia, "Madballs in Babo: Invasion", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108387.name: Alpine Rally Race
108387.description: An old roll-and-move type game. Per the publisher ... "A fun packed rally race game over rugged alpine mountains".

108389.name: Neverwinter Nights: Infinite Dungeons
108389.description:
The module is set in Forgotten Realms' Undermountain of Waterdeep, already visited in Hordes of the Underdark expansion. The game is a dungeon-crawler in style of Dungeon Siege featuring D&D rules. The story follows character(s) as they enter Undermountain in order to defeat its ruler, mad mage Halaster and his six powerful generals. A boy named Timmy helps the players while they are resting outside the dungeons, near the underground entrance to Undermountain.

Source: Wikipedia, "Neverwinter Nights: Infinite Dungeons (module)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108390.name: Neverwinter Nights: Pirates of the Sword Coast
108390.description:
The module is set in Forgotten Realms. The player takes the role of a character who is employed by Captain Allendry as part crew member and part passenger aboard the Midnight Rose. The adventure is intimately bound up with the sea and redolent with piratical artifacts and references, such as swashbuckling items, treasure maps, navigational instruments and a talking parrot who will not leave you alone. It also features adventures with undead pirates, underwater adventures, and a lengthy episode where the player is marooned on a wild island. The game featured:

Stand-alone story that includes many colorful characters and possibilities.
New tilesets, including pirate caves and underwater location "Fiddler's Green".
New pirate-styled items and characters.

Source: Wikipedia, "Neverwinter Nights: Pirates of the Sword Coast", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108391.name: Neverwinter Nights: Wyvern Crown of Cormyr
108391.description:
The module is set in Forgotten Realms, in Cormyr. The player character returns home and discovers a massacre and sets out for vengeance. The premium module includes many new features:

Horse-riding: ability to use various horses, fight while on horse, and participate in jousting tournaments.
New tilesets and locations comparable to Neverwinter Nights 2.
New medieval knight-styled armor, weapons, and items.
New prestige class "Purple Dragon Knight".
Mini-games including darts, archery competition, "recognize a spell", and jousting tournaments.

Source: Wikipedia, "Neverwinter Nights: Wyvern Crown of Cormyr (module)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108392.description:
Speak and remember: can you introduce yourself properly and get the number of eyes, noses or ears right like all good Mishmashian Martians from planet Mishmash?

In this game, each player is a Martian. In the beginning of the game, each player receives a portrait, which indicates how many eyes, ears and noses he has.

Each turn, a player plays a card with an eye, ear or nose on it. He then has to call another player, using a prescribed phrase which includes the count of eyes (or ears, or noses, depending on the card place) the calling player and the called player have.

If a player gets the phrase wrong (or hesitates to long), he gets an extra eye, ear or nose (again depending on the card played) which is added to his forehead by means of a ribbon each player wears on his head. This extra feature has to be taken into account in future turns.

If a player gains his fifth additional ear, eye or nose, he is out of the game. The last player to remain wins.
108392.name: Bizaroïd

108393.name: Neverwinter Nights: Shadowguard
108393.description:
The game is set in Abaron, a setting specially created for the module. The Sarakhan Empire is the most prominent force in this world, being led by a divine emperor named Rakha, who is willing to unify the whole world. However, the northern lands are not willing to enter the Empire, and fights back. A mysterious Crimson Prophet is believed to be the leader of the resistance. The story takes place in Ghaarak, an emperial city located near the northern territories' borderline.

The module itself is named after the organization featuring prominently in the game. The player is the son of Ocaris, one of the city's leaders, who is finishing his student time in the academy. The game starts out in a graduation ceremony of sorts where they get to pick one of three magic symbols to be their own. Each symbol has special actions and bonuses that go with it. After the graduation, the instructor tells the player that a man is looking for them. The man's name is Markius.

It is soon revealed that the character is meant to enter a secret organization, the Shadowguard, who protects the Empire from various threats. The story leads the player into a series of tasks given by Markius, the leader of Shadowguards, and his fellow friends. The tasks involves the player taking down a slaver syndicate and few other criminal elements. However, the city of Ghaarak ends up slowly falling into chaos due to arrival of Crimson Prophet - a mage willing to destroy the Empire, who steals a powerful artifacts and kills the character's father, Ocaris.

Soon, a full-scale assault is began on the city, performed by northern people under the Crimson Prophet's instructions. The player has only one option: to escape the doomed city along with the members of Shadowguard. Battling their way to the docks, they encounters Crimson Prophet again, but is unable to defeat him, as he proves to be too powerful.

The module's story ends with the character escaping the city with the Shadowguard on board of a ship, Voyager. The story was meant to be continued, but no sequels were ever made.

Source: Wikipedia, "Neverwinter Nights: ShadowGuard (module)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108394.name: Neverwinter Nights: Witch's Wake
108394.description:
Witch's Wake is set in a unique setting created specially for the module, which features a dark, mysterious world and lots of unique sub-races with their own special bonuses.

The game starts as the player character awakens on a battlefield with all his/her memories lost. A dying prince asks him/her to deliver to his father a message that "she is dead". Soon, the PC meets Night Hag, a witch that is very willing to help him/her discover his/her past. She grants the PC passage to the Plane of Sorrow - a place where the living world collides with the world of the dead, Stygia. The Plane of Sorrow is inhabited by the souls who are about to enter the world of undead, and Filchers, the spirits who is notorious for their thieving nature. The player journeys through the world of the game looking for answers and an only man who is left from the PC's squad, sometimes visiting the Plane of Sorrow. After venturing through some dangerous encounters, the player enters dwarfs village, Brogan's Arm. Here, he/she discovers that the man he/she is looking for has stolen the Cavanaugh Stone, a holy artifact of great importance. In the end of module, the player finally discovers the man, Caldrian, who finally reveals what happened.

The encounter with Caldrian leads the player to the realization that they were part of a Witch hunter squad who battled a witch and apparently killed her. The squad was, however, obliterated by her power, and the few survivors lost their memory. Just after the dialogue, a ghostly figure of a woman appears, writing a message "The fields of battle lie in the hearts of men...".

At this moment, the story ends with the player discovering the truth of what happened to him and his squad. A prompt to begin the next installment of the module appears, but since the sequel was never finished, this option does nothing.

Source: Wikipedia, "Neverwinter Nights: Witch's Wake", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108395.name: Neverwinter Nights: Darkness over Daggerford
108395.description:
The intro of the game tells the player about the recent events in city of Daggerford. Pwyll Greatshout, the duke of Daggerford, died during strange circumstances. To maintain stability, a new leader was chosen: baron Matagar Bugo, who promises the citizens to make Daggerford a new trading giant like Waterdeep. In the meantime, raider attacks on caravans become too often, and strange disappearings of cattle make people believe that hard times wait ahead.

The game begins with players working as freelance adventurers escorting a caravan from Waterdeep to Daggerford. Along the way, the caravan is attacked by a mysterious group and one of the player's party members, Talarenne, is kidnapped. He soon discovers that Talarenne was mistaken for an agent of Waterdeep who came to city in order to find out truth about Pwyll Greatshout death and the current political situation. The player decides to aid the agent.

The rest of the story follows the player character's efforts to rescue the missing party member and find the truth about what is going on around Daggerford. Gradually, an evil plot by Zhentarim is uncovered, and player has to do everything to stop it from fruition, or the city might be taken over... or even destroyed.

Source: Wikipedia, "Darkness over Daggerford", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

108396.name: Konsensus
108396.description: Konsensus is an imaginative and innovative board game in which you try to put yourself in the mindset of the other players and answer the same as them. You are faced with a series of tasks that may seem easy, but quickly becomes difficult because your brain is affected by visual impressions, feelings, and imagination. Can you link it all together and find the answers that will earn you points?

108399.name: G. I. Hero
108399.description:
User Summary

G.I. Hero puts you on the shoes of a soldier launched on enemy territory with the mission to kill their leader and destroy their helicopter force.
Starting lost and separated from your companion for this mission (an alsatian wolf dog) you must start to travel trough the terrain to find him and find the enemies base.

108401.name: ACE 2088
108401.description:
User Summary

ACE 2088 is a strategy/simulation space ship game.

Your mission is to liberate the galaxy. You start aboard the Space Ship Deliverance and in it you have the Zeigler fighters you use to liberate each planet. Before launching you can equip your fighter for the planet mission. You can also navigate through the several star systems of this galaxy.
When you launch your fighter you go in flight sim mode, fighting with enemies ships, and bombing the planets bases to liberate it.

108402.name: Le Coucou picard
108402.description:
The goal is to get an egg in the nest opposite the central square of the first line in the 9x12 grid game board.
Players move his eggs.

The movement of the eggs is determined by the line where they are at the time to move.
At start egg may move one square straight, Once an egg is above the fifth line, its possibilities are largely increased. It can move straight or diagonally one square. It can also move faster to a number of spaces determined by the number of eggs on his line.

108403.name: Move
108403.description:
There is a 8 balls for each player, 9 white balls and one black ball in 5x5 grid game board (26 balls)

In his turn player pushes a row with the 26th ball, placing a ball in front of this row leaving a ball from the end of the same row to be the 26th ball.

The goal is to achieve an alignment of five balls of their color or 4 balls of their color and the black ball, which acts as a wildball.

108405.name: Muz Hit: Le Jeu du top!
108405.description:
A music trivia game (think Music-themed Trivia Pursuit)!

A diamond disc race ensues between players! They can be earned directly on the "Diamonds" boxes or exchanged for a 5 vinyl discs.

The questions are all in the form of multiple choice and offer 3 major categories: 'Reprises', "Artists' and 'screens and boards"

Each player has 2 pawns of the same colour, which go through the corridors of the plateau board, in an inward-spiraling player track. The questions trace the life of french and international hits in categories of Top 50, rap, rock, etc... from 1984 to present day.

108406.name: Fire & Water
